version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="abortion"> <abortion id="10" name="Preg. Termination"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <date/> <motechId/> <terminationType/> <procedure/> <complications/> <maternalDeath/> <referred/> <postAbortiobFPCounseled/> <postAbortionFPAccepted/> <comments/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>abortion-jf</formname> </abortion> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/abortion/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/abortion/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/abortion/date" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/abortion/motechId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind id="terminationType" nodeset="/abortion/terminationType" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="procedure" nodeset="/abortion/procedure" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="complications" nodeset="/abortion/complications" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="maternalDeath" nodeset="/abortion/maternalDeath" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="referred" nodeset="/abortion/referred" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="postAbortiobFPCounseled" nodeset="/abortion/postAbortiobFPCounseled" relevant="/abortion/maternalDeath = 'N'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="postAbortionFPAccepted" nodeset="/abortion/postAbortionFPAccepted" relevant="/abortion/postAbortiobFPCounseled = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="comments" nodeset="/abortion/comments" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/abortion/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/abortion/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page2</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="date"> <xf:label>Termination date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="terminationType"> <xf:label>Type</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Elective</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Spontaneous</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Induced (unsafe)</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="procedure"> <xf:label>Procedure</xf:label> <xf:item id="NA"> <xf:label>None</xf:label> <xf:value>NA</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>D and C</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>MVA</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Other</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select bind="complications"> <xf:label>Complications</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Bleeding</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Sepsis/Infection</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Perforations</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select> <xf:select1 bind="maternalDeath"> <xf:label>Maternal Death</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="referred"> <xf:label>Referred</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="postAbortiobFPCounseled"> <xf:label>FP counseled?</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="postAbortionFPAccepted"> <xf:label>FP accepted?</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="comments"> <xf:label>Comments</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formname"> <xf:label>formName</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>
